articles.title: Is Curt Cignetti Delivering the Greatest Coaching Performance in Sports History? - The Ringer
articles.description: How does Cignetti’s turnaround at Indiana compare to the all-time great coaching jobs in sports, from Bill Belichick with the Patriots to Claudio Ranieri with Leicester City? We created a system to find out.
